name: RESTACK Developer Guide
tagline: RESTACK is the universal interface for connected devices
body:
### Welcome

HTTP REST API: (base URI: https://alpha.restack.io)
Our API endpoints require authentication credentials to be passed in the HTTP headers as restack_auth_uuid and restack_auth_token.

1. Go to [https://dashboard.restack.io/register](https://dashboard.restack.io/register) and create an account
2. Go to **Devices -> New device** and add a new device. You will receive an UUID for your device and a token.
3. Use this credentials to send data.

# Endpoints

## Status (method: GET)
Returns the status of RESTACK API service

```
curl -X GET https://alpha.restack.io/status
```
response:
```
{
  "restack": "online"
}
```

## IP (method: GET)
Returns the public IP address of the request

```
curl -X GET https://alpha.restack.io/ipaddress
```

response:
```
{
  "ipAddress": "127.0.0.1"
}
```

## DATA (method: POST)
Stores device/sensor data for a specific UUID. You can pass any key/value pairs.

```
curl -X POST -d "luminosity=102&temperature=-5" https://alpha.restack.io/data/520ca5d1-a1e9-11e4-903e-c1e2ccd2ffa5 --header "restack_auth_uuid: {uuid}" --header "restack_auth_token: {token}"
```

response:
```
{
  "timestamp": "2015-01-22T05:30:02.375Z",
  "uuid": "520ca5d1-a1e9-11e4-903e-c1e2ccd2ffa5",
  "temperature": "-5",
  "luminosity": "102",
  "ipAddress": "188.30.124.60",
  "eventCode": 700,
  "_id": "54c08ada3d61a74760db80c3"
}
```



### More to come soon
Control your devices remotely, MQTT protocol and debugging tools.


### Support or Contact
Having trouble with the API? Drop us a line on twitter [@restack_io](https://twitter.com/restack_io)
